meanings.sent1: The basement had a frowsty odor that made me sneeze.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house had a frowsty smell from years of neglect.
meanings.sent3: Grandma's attic was so frowsty that even the spiders wore tiny gas masks.
meanings.sent4: The frowsty scent of old books enveloped me like a cloud of memories.
meanings.sent5: The frowsty aroma of damp earth and decaying leaves filled the forest.

meanings.definition: Old-fashioned or outdated in style or appearance
meanings.sent1: Her frowsty dress looked like it came from a different century.
meanings.sent2: The antique shop was filled with frowsty furniture that reminded me of my grandmother's house.
meanings.sent3: He tried to impress his friends with a frowsty hat that belonged to his great-grandfather.
meanings.sent4: The frowsty design of the building stood out like a relic from the past.
meanings.sent5: The frowsty paintings in the museum seemed to whisper stories of bygone eras.
